ValidationRule.description: Requires that the Account Number for a Person Account matches the formatting for the COCC Person Number (P:00000).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsPersonAccount = true, ISCHANGED(AccountNumber), OR( NOT(LEFT(AccountNumber ,2) = "P:"), LEFT(AccountNumber ,3) = "P: "), $Profile.Name = "End User")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Number must equal the COCC Person Number for this customer. The COCC Person Number entered in the Account Number field must be formatted as follows: "P:00000"
